name: Kaiju X: Live Long and Multiply
name_original: Kaiju X: Live Long and Multiply
description:
Click the monsters that multiply together to equal the values on the red buttons. Click the buttons to send the monsters back home. Save the city and multiply to decimate the invading creatures.

Kaiju X: Live Long and Multiply is from an internal 3 day gamejam. Inspired by The Counting Kingdom, I wanted to adapt the gameplay to multiplication and try to fix some of my frustrations with its failstates. This version of Kaiju X includes additional improvements after the gamejam including the addition mode.

Credits

Created in a three day game jam in December 2020 by:

  • David
  • Jeff
  • Steven
